top_comments.comment: Fun fact: that Naval Piranha easter egg is referenced in Yoshi's Woolly World. In that game you can still throw an egg (or a yarn ball I guess) at it and Kamek will react the same way. But he'll still make you fight him.

Found out about #6 looking for a way to bypass level 6-7. My seven year old self somehow made it past a gauntlet of chomps, bomb platforms, and bandits, and yet failed to enter a pipe that was clearly the way out at the end. Kids are stupid, except when they’re not.
I still love it how the best boss with the best music, aside from Bowser himself, can be defeated so easily like that.
“OH, MY!” Is still the funniest thing

comments_since_last_sample.body: Um, the line "Here's Johnny" is itself a reference to the Johnny Carson show. Ed McMahon, Carson's co-host would say it every episode.
That yoshi islands trick is so OG I Remember it as a kid! When the game was new haha that was fun.
That opening man gets me in the feels everytime I see that clip! I remember it from Starcraft and even Magic the gathering Card Game on PC.
